Career  
ENGIE UK – August 2017 to date 
 
UK subsidiary of ENGIE Group.  A £3bn p.a energy and services business with interests in renewable energy 
infrastructure, gas and power supply, district heating schemes and hard/soft FM services. 
 
Business Development Manager – Green Mobility 
Reporting to the divisional managing director, I lead the start-up of ENGIE’s Gas for Transport business in the UK.   
 
Develop and implementation of the business strategy, lead all aspects of the business start up including product and 
service development, sourcing, engineering, HSE, commercial policies, back office processes and resourcing. 
 
Sales responsibility for hydrogen and natural gas refuelling infrastructure projects.   Forming partnerships within the 
value chain and with local authorities and logistics companies to develop Hydrogen and gas refuelling projects.  
 
 
BOC Ltd (A member of Linde group) -   June 1994 to August 2017 
 
Market leading UK based industrial gases company with £1bn p.a turnover.  Specialising in sales of bulk cryogenic 
liquids and compressed gases, process technology and associated infrastructure/services.    
 
Market Development Manager – Clean Fuels – June 2016 to August 2017 
Reporting to the business manager Clean Fuels, I was responsible for sales & market development of the Clean Fuels 
business focussing on hydrogen mobility.   
 
Responsible for commercial & operational management of the Hydrogen mobility business including P&L 
responsibility, key supplier and service relationships and key customer relationships.  Led and achieved sales growth 
in the hydrogen refuelling station product line to systems integrators and direct customers. 
 
Management responsibility for FCHJU and Innovate UK grant funded projects including the Aberdeen Hydrogen bus 
project. 
 
Represented BOC interests in Hydrogen mobility through industry associations, UK and EU government relationships 
and partnership/collaborative relationships within the value chain. 
 
Sales Manager – Liquid Natural Gas (LNG) – August 2011 to May 2016 
Reported to the business manager LNG and responsible for the sales and market development activities of the LNG 
business in the UK.  I was responsibility for the sales and marketing plan and managing a team of business 
development managers selling to the heavy truck, marine and industrial sectors. 
 
Owned the sales and product development plan leading cross functional teams to evolve and launch new products 
and services.  Successful launch of 2 new products which directly contributed to revenue growth 
 
Created and managed a sales team, established and implemented sales & account management processes, tools 
and SFDC to achieve sales growth 
 
Direct responsibility for key customer management and in the start up phase personally secured £15m of sales 
contracts 
 
  
Business Development Manager (Innovation) – February 2010 to July 2011 
Reported to the head of future business and innovation.  I held responsibility for the detailed evaluation and 
development of new business or new products and services through a stage and gate process from concept to 
investment approval to market entry.   
 
Project manager for the development to launch of the LNG business.  I led a cross functional team to construct the

business functions.
